channel.title: Scotland West on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Scotland West on The Majority

item.title: My Journey to Alliance For Unity
item.description: Did you hear the one about the lifelong Rangers fan who spoke to George Galloway and decided to work with him to help redefine the Scottish political landscape? It’s not a joke, it’s exactly what happened to me two weeks ago. Until this time, I had never interacted with George Galloway and had never felt any wish to do so. From nowhere, a series of tweets appeared from the former MP, urging pro-UK political parties to form an alliance to defeat the SNP.
